query: Explain the key capabilities of the Sovereign Orchestrator and how it ensures workflow security. Cite exact sections from retrieved content.

Title: 

. A Modern Container Platform further enhances adaptability by supporting containerized workloads across diverse chip architectures, making it a versatile solution for evolving technological needs.

Matteo Alberto Brignoli

URL: https://itnb.ch/en/products-and-services/software-as-a-service/sovereign-orchestrator)
Title: 

## Swiss Digital Sovereignty.  
Achieved.
Ready to empower your business with Sovereign Cloud, AI and Cybersecurity?

Own Your Stack. Rule Your Models. Run Your Use-Cases.
## AI Model as a Service
AI Model as a Service allows users Model-as-a-Service and Bring Your Own Model on dedicated GPUs in a Sovereign and secure environment.
[Learn More](https://itnb.ch/en/products-and-services/platform-as-a-service/ai-model-as-a-service)[Buy Now](https://console.itnb.ch/en/products/categories/CLOUD_MAAS_BUDGET)

Your Data, Your Rules.
## Sovereign Cloud
Built on enterprise-grade hardware and without compromising Sovereignty, security or scalability - we offer the most modern and cost-effective Cloud and AI Infrastructure in Switzerland.
[Learn More](https://itnb.ch/en/products-and-services/infrastructure-as-a-service/sovereign-cloud)[Buy Now](https://console.itnb.ch/en/products/categories/CLOUD_INFRA)

Built for Speed. Anchored by Sovereignty. On Your Premises.
## Speedboat
On-Premises Sovereign Cloud cluster - engineered for speed, security, and scalability with a full-stack solution optimized for AI, virtual machines, and containerized workloads.

Seamless Workflows. Total Control.
## Sovereign Orchestrator
Empower your teams with a Sovereign AI solution that automates business workflows securely, efficiently, and in full compliance with Swiss data protection standards.
[Learn More](https://itnb.ch/en/products-and-services/software-as-a-service/sovereign-orchestrator)

content.text:
The Sovereign Orchestrator is described as a "fast, secure, and sovereign way to unlock intelligent automation" [1]. Its key capabilities include supporting "containerized workloads across diverse chip architectures" and providing a "Sovereign and secure environment" for AI Model as a Service, allowing users to bring their own models on dedicated GPUs [1][2].

The Sovereign Orchestrator ensures workflow security by providing a sovereign cloud built on "enterprise-grade hardware" without compromising sovereignty, security, or scalability [2]. Additionally, the AI Model as a Service is offered in a "Sovereign and secure environment" [2].

For more detailed information on the Sovereign Orchestrator's capabilities and security features, I suggest checking the ITNB website, specifically the pages related to Sovereign Orchestrator and AI Model as a Service [https://itnb.ch/en/products-and-services/software-as-a-service/sovereign-orchestrator](https://itnb.ch/en/products-and-services/software-as-a-service/sovereign-orchestrator) [2].
